message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - info.novatec.testit.livingdoc.server.domain.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - info.novatec.testit.livingdoc.server.rest.requests.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - info.novatec.testit.livingdoc.server.rest.responses.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.ws.rs.*.
First sentence should end with a period.
